mosinstall.name: bot_autotag
mosinstall.author: Fiji Web Design
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2007 Fiji Web Design. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This mambot will auto tag the content items based on the title and title_alias keywords.

param.name: min_keyword_len
param.label: Min Keyword Length
param.description: The minimum length of valid keywords to extract from the title and title_alias.

param.name: common_keywords
param.default: that these them their they there those
param.label: Common Keywords
param.description: Common words that should be ignored by the keyword extractor. Seperate by a space
